hero.title: Riad Alassala
hero.subtitle: A tranquil riad retreat in the heart of the old medina, where contemporary elegance meets the timeless soul of Marrakech.

intro.title: Riad Alassala
intro.description: Riad Alassala welcomes guests into a serene world of warm light, perfumed courtyards and thoughtful Moroccan hospitality. Handcrafted details, quiet alcoves and curated art pieces create a discreet yet inviting atmosphere, perfect for slow mornings and long, candlelit evenings above the medina rooftops.

discover.title: Your Marrakech Story
discover.subtitle: From intimate festive gatherings by the fire to sunlit breakfasts on the terrace, Riad Alassala is crafted for moments you will want to linger in.

festive.title: Festive Experiences
festive.description: Celebrate the season with candlelit dinners, live oud music and bespoke celebrations tailored to your gathering.

accommodations.title: Accommodations
accommodations.description: Suites and rooms blend handcrafted zellige, soft linens and calm palettes, creating a sanctuary from the vibrant medina.

dining.title: Dining
dining.description: Savor modern Moroccan flavors, rooftop aperitifs and leisurely afternoon teas in our tranquil salons and terraces.

journey.title: Family Moments in the Medina
journey.description: Share slow mornings over rooftop breakfasts, wander lantern‑lit alleys with a private guide and return to your own courtyard sanctuary. Our family offer includes daily breakfast, a tailored medina experience and thoughtful surprises for younger guests.

giftCard.title: The Riad Alassala Gift Card
giftCard.subtitle: Share the medina with someone special. Our gift cards may be tailored to overnight stays, spa rituals or private rooftop dinners overlooking the city.

hero.title: Accommodation
hero.subtitle: Thoughtfully designed rooms and suites that echo the textures and palette of Marrakech while offering every contemporary comfort.

section.title: Suites & Rooms
section.subtitle: Choose from intimate rooms for quiet escapes or expansive suites perfect for longer stays and family gatherings.

superior.name: Dar Superior Room
superior.description: Soft earth tones, hand‑woven textiles and tall windows overlooking the inner courtyard create a calm retreat after days in the medina.

patio.name: Patio Suite
patio.description: Spacious suites with a private seating area, zellige details and direct access to the central patio and its gentle fountain.

rooftop.name: Rooftop Terrace Suite
rooftop.description: Wake to golden medina light and end the day with mint tea under the stars on your own rooftop terrace lounge.

grand.name: Grand Medina House
grand.description: A private multi‑room residence with salon, dining space and exclusive use of a rooftop plunge pool and sun deck.
